entry.title: 3M SB31630 - Scotch-Brite Surface Conditioning Film Backed Belt, 6 in x 312 in A Med, Sb31630 7000120979
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 342.37

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Surface Conditioning Film Backed Belt, 6 in x 312 in A MED, 1 per case

  • Scotch Briteâ„¢ Surface Conditioning Film Backed Belt is a non-woven belt used for cleaning, finishing, blending, and deburring applications
  • The smooth, tough, stretch-resistant nylon film backing works well with platens or when reduced friction is required.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Great multi-purpose belt, ideal for cleaning, finishing, blending and deburring
  • Nylon film backing is stretch resistant for close, ongoing cutting action
  • The film backed belts work great on stroke sanders when reduced friction on the back of the belt is desired
  • Gaps between nylon fibers allow debris to escape, helping to reduce loading
  • Fibers break down gradually to reveal fresh mineral, producing consistent cuts
  • Available in a range of grades, minerals and converted forms
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB19631 - Scotch-Brite Surface Conditioning Low Stretch Belt, 3/4 in x 118 in A Med, Sb19631 7000120896
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 20.56

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Surface Conditioning Low Stretch Belt, 3/4 in x 118 in A MED, 20 per case

  • The Scotch-Briteâ„¢ Surface Conditioning Low Stretch Belt is well-suited for high belt tension applications and has a loftier web especially resistant to loading on soft and/or oily materials
  • It is ideal for cleaning and finishing softer metals such as aluminum, copper, and brass, as well as non-ferrous metals
  • Its thicker construction also achieves a highly uniform finish on stainless steel.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Durable cloth / polyester scrim backing is ideal for low-stretch applications
  • May be used on a variety of substrates, from stainless steel to brass
  • Available in a variety of minerals, grades and belt types, so operators can choose the right combination for their application
  • Springy non-woven nylon fibers finish while maintaining the geometry of the piece
  • Open web is load resistant, prolonging abrasive service life
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB15971 - Scotch-Brite Surface Conditioning Low Stretch Belt, 6 in x 132 in A Med, Sb15971 7000120759
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 150.86

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Surface Conditioning Low Stretch Belt, 6 in x 132 in A MED, 2 per case

  • The Scotch-Briteâ„¢ Surface Conditioning Low Stretch Belt is well-suited for high belt tension applications and has a loftier web especially resistant to loading on soft and/or oily materials
  • It is ideal for cleaning and finishing softer metals such as aluminum, copper, and brass, as well as non-ferrous metals
  • Its thicker construction also achieves a highly uniform finish on stainless steel.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Durable cloth / polyester scrim backing is ideal for low-stretch applications
  • May be used on a variety of substrates, from stainless steel to brass
  • Available in a variety of minerals, grades and belt types, so operators can choose the right combination for their application
  • Springy non-woven nylon fibers finish while maintaining the geometry of the piece
  • Open web is load resistant, prolonging abrasive service life
    		•
